answers.answer: Medical conditions such as obesity, diabetes, insulin resistance and atherosclerosis are associated with more frequent skin tags.  Research findings in the May 2009 "Cleveland Clinic Journal of Medicine" article suggest that individuals with prediabetes or diabetes are at high risk for developing small fibre neuropathy.
